mapper.select: select * from(select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from terminal order by name asc) tt) where region=#{region} and (rn>=#{startNum} and rn<=#{endNum});
select * from(select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from terminal order by name asc) tt) where (region = #{region} and (name like '%%' or subtext like '%평%')) and (rn>=#{startNum} and rn<=#{endNum});
